actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to assist in the financing of education expenses for the middle class.
short_title: Middle Class Education Opportunity Act of 1995

summary.text: Middle Class Education Opportunity Act of 1995 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an individual a deduction for the amount of qualified higher education expenses paid by the individual. Limits the amount allowed to $5,000. Provides for a limitation based on modified adjusted gross income and other limitations.

titles.title: Middle Class Education Opportunity Act of 1995
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to assist in the financing of education expenses for the middle class.
